heading: ***WIND ADVISORIES FROM THE SOUTHERN GREEN MOUNTAINS WEST TO THE HUDSON VALLEY MIDDAY THROUGH EARLY SATURDAY***Today, Hallowe’en
text: Some morning rain from the Green Mountains west, showers east, then scattered to numerous afternoon showers north, tapering off south. Highs in the low to mid 50s, falling this afternoon. East winds shifting to the southwest 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Scattered showers north, mixing or changing to snow showers, a dusting to an inch over the high terrain. Mostly cloudy south. Lows ranging through the 30s. Southwest winds becoming west 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 35 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Localized morning rain or snow showers north, tapering off. Morning clouds south giving way to increasing sunshine. Chilly. Highs only in the 40s, upper 30s over the higher terrain north. West winds, shifting to the northwest 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 35 mph.
